name: Dr. Avinash Bhardwaj
description: Avinash is currently a faculty member at the India Institute of Technology - Bombay, and holds a PhD in Operations Research from UC Berkeley.

name: Shubham Sandeep
description: Shubham is a member of the 2019 Forbes 30 Under 30 cohort for Manufacturing & Industry, and the former CCO of Skytree.

name: Prof. Igor Rivin
description: Igor is a former Regius Professor of Mathematics at the University of St. Andrews and co-creator of the CCi30 cryptocurrency market index, and holds a PhD in Mathematics from Princeton.
